Title: Expands the crime of robbery in the first and second degrees to include attempts made with a device appearing to be a bomb, destructive device or explosive
Summary: Expands the crime of robbery in the first and second degrees to include attempts made with a device appearing to be a bomb, destructive device or explosive or hazardous substance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to expanding the crime of robbery in the first and second degrees to include attempts of such crime with a device appearing to be a bomb or other explosive device
